turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm calling about a charge on my account. I was billed $75 last month, and I only have the basic plan which should be $50. I'm really frustrated because this has happened before.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can definitely look into that for you. Could you please provide me with your account number or the phone number associated with the account?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 555-123-4567. And honestly, what's causing these overcharges? Is there a known issue with the billing system?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. Let me pull up your account. Okay, I see the $75 charge for last month. It appears there was a temporary promotional upgrade applied to your account that has now expired. The system automatically renewed it for one month, which caused the higher charge. My apologies for the inconvenience.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: A promotional upgrade? I never asked for any upgrade! Why would you automatically renew something I didn't even request? This seems really unethical.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your concern. I've removed the upgrade and credited your account $25 to reflect the correct billing amount for the basic plan. You should see that reflected in your next statement. To answer your earlier question, these promotional upgrades are occasionally offered as part of a limited-time campaign to entice users to explore additional features.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I see the credit. Thanks for that. But just so I'm clear, how can I prevent this from happening again? Can I opt-out of *all* promotional offers in the future? I don't want to have to call back about this next month.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, absolutely. I've updated your account preferences to opt you out of all future promotional offers and automatic renewals. You won't receive any further promotional upgrades without your explicit consent. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
